title: (x) J.Crew Font ID? / Monolinear geometric sans - Silver Thread {Rainer}
content:
Love this J.Crew font:

[http://www.jcrew.com/index.jsp](http://web.archive.org/web/20100314165654/http:/www.jcrew.com/index.jsp)

The one that says "muse worthy"

any ideas on ID?

Thanks!
author: jessijohn

comments.content: Have a look at [Silver Thread](http://web.archive.org/web/20100314165654/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=JBT0000108), a digital revival of L&C Hairline by Jason Walcott.
